description:
Keroro and company infiltrate Musha Viper Goemon`s fortress to find the final legendary weapon, while Dororo duels with fellow ninja (and Koyuki lookalike) Yukino, who stole the first four crystals from the platoon.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Musha Kero, Volume 5: Keronian of the Hidden Fortress
武者ケロ・伍の巻 隠し砦ケロン人 でござ候
